content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":251152,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルの過去話２","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheel's Past Story 2"},{"lineNumber":251153,"originalJapaneseLine":"大都市オールドゼスに到着、町の様子","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrived at the large city Old Zeas, the state of the town"},{"lineNumber":251154,"originalJapaneseLine":"みんな飢えている、食料品は５〜１０倍の値段","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone is starving, food prices are 5 to 10 times higher"},{"lineNumber":251155,"originalJapaneseLine":"飲食店は閉鎖、荒んでいる感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"Restaurants are closed, giving a bleak feeling"},{"lineNumber":251156,"originalJapaneseLine":"腹を空かせた子供がランス達にめぐんでくれとやってくる","translatedEnglishLine":"Hungry children come to Rance and the others asking for handouts"},{"lineNumber":251157,"originalJapaneseLine":"兵士もいる、腹へった・・魔軍の奴ら根こそぎ食料を持っていく","translatedEnglishLine":"There are soldiers too, hungry... the demon army guys take all the food away"},{"lineNumber":251158,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人が出てくるから勝てないけど、飢えて死ぬくらいなら戦った方がマシだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Because demons appear and we can't win, but better to fight than starve to death"},{"lineNumber":251159,"originalJapaneseLine":"次に奴らが要求してきたら戦う、渡す食料もないしな","translatedEnglishLine":"Next time they demand, we'll fight; we don't have food to give anyway"},{"lineNumber":251160,"originalJapaneseLine":"ひどい状況だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a terrible situation."},{"lineNumber":251161,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルはもっと非道い状況を予想していたので一安心、飢え死にしている人もいないしと","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheel expected a worse situation, so she feels somewhat relieved that no one is starving to death"},{"lineNumber":251162,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィル、ところでお前の家はどこだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheel, by the way, where is your home?"},{"lineNumber":251163,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここじゃないですよ、大都会オールドゼスではなくて、ここから少し離れた所に","translatedEnglishLine":"It's not here, not in the big city Old Zeas, but somewhere a little far from here"},{"lineNumber":251164,"originalJapaneseLine":"ひまわり村という小さな村です。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a small village called Himawari Village."},{"lineNumber":251165,"originalJapaneseLine":"なに、最初からそういえ、言いましたよー　さっきの昔話でも","translatedEnglishLine":"What, say that from the start, I told you so — even in the old story earlier"},{"lineNumber":251166,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":"> Choice"},{"lineNumber":251167,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t＞　ひまわり村に行く","translatedEnglishLine":"> Go to Himawari Village"},{"lineNumber":251168,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t＞　ガルティア退治を優先する","translatedEnglishLine":"> Prioritize defeating Galtia"},{"lineNumber":251169,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがシィルに聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance asks Sheel"},{"lineNumber":251170,"originalJapaneseLine":"ところで、一度も実家に戻ろうとはしなかったのは何故だ","translatedEnglishLine":"By the way, why did you never try to return to your family home?"},{"lineNumber":251171,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺様も鬼ではないぞ、裸で土下座してお願いしたらいつでもいかせてやったぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm not a demon; if you had begged on your knees naked, I'd have let you go anytime"},{"lineNumber":251172,"originalJapaneseLine":"　両親が反対していたのに無理いって都会に出ようとした","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though my parents opposed it, I insisted on going to the city"},{"lineNumber":251173,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人買いに言われた、私は死んだと報告されて、もう葬式もされたと","translatedEnglishLine":"I was told by slave traders that they reported me as dead, and already had a funeral"},{"lineNumber":251174,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様の元で絶対服従魔法がかかっていたせいもあるかもしれないが","translatedEnglishLine":"It might also be because I was under absolute obedience magic by Lord Rance"},{"lineNumber":251175,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何年も両親に連絡しなかったし、タイミングを逸した","translatedEnglishLine":"I haven’t contacted my parents for years and missed the right timing"},{"lineNumber":251176,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それに・・奴隷になっていますとか言えない","translatedEnglishLine":"Also... I couldn’t say I had become a slave"},{"lineNumber":251177,"originalJapaneseLine":"みたいな事をぽつりと","translatedEnglishLine":"She muttered something like that"},{"lineNumber":251178,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様、オールドゼスの状況を見た限り、実家の田舎とかもっと大丈夫ですよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rance, judging from Old Zeas' condition, your rural hometown should be even safer"},{"lineNumber":251179,"originalJapaneseLine":"全然気にする必要無いです、今は大事な任務の時です。","translatedEnglishLine":"There's no need to worry at all, now is an important mission time."},{"lineNumber":251180,"originalJapaneseLine":"戻りましょう。ねっねっ","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's go back. Come on, come on"},{"lineNumber":251181,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、いく・・くくくく","translatedEnglishLine":"No, I'll go... hehehe"},{"lineNumber":251182,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルがランスに話しかける・・もう両親の無事は確認されたようなものですし","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheel speaks to Rance... it seems her parents' safety has already been confirmed"},{"lineNumber":251183,"originalJapaneseLine":"私ほんとうに大丈夫ですよ、ここまで連れてきて頂けてありがとうございます。","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm really fine, thank you for bringing me this far."},{"lineNumber":251184,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":251185,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・あの、ランス様、どうして私の両親に会おうと思ったのですか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Um, Lord Rance, why did you want to meet my parents?"},{"lineNumber":251186,"originalJapaneseLine":"まさか、その・・　なんかいい方に想像して顔を赤らめる","translatedEnglishLine":"Could it be, um... imagining something nice, blushing"},{"lineNumber":251187,"originalJapaneseLine":"　娘さんを下さいとか・・えっ、えっ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Asking 'Give me your daughter' or something... eh, eh..."},{"lineNumber":251188,"originalJapaneseLine":"奴隷娘を手に入れたら、両親の前でする定番の鬼畜行為とは何か知っているか","translatedEnglishLine":"Do you know the usual cruel acts done in front of the parents when you get a slave girl?"},{"lineNumber":251189,"originalJapaneseLine":"両親の前でお前を胸をもんだりしながら、お前の娘は俺の穴奴隷になったのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"In front of your parents, I would fondle your breasts while saying your daughter became my hole-slave."},{"lineNumber":251190,"originalJapaneseLine":"こうやって毎日遊んでやってるぜ、がははは・・とかだ","translatedEnglishLine":"I play with you like this every day, hahaha... or something like that"},{"lineNumber":251191,"originalJapaneseLine":"エロマンガで読んだ事のあるシチュだ、ぜひ一度やりたいと思っていたのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a situation I've read about in erotic manga; I've wanted to try it once"},{"lineNumber":251192,"originalJapaneseLine":"えっ・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Eh..."},{"lineNumber":251193,"originalJapaneseLine":"村の様子がおかしい、騒がしいぞ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"The village's state is strange, it's noisy..."},{"lineNumber":251194,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうやら、山賊が現れて占領しているらしい","translatedEnglishLine":"Apparently, bandits appeared and are occupying it"},{"lineNumber":251195,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼスの軍隊も警備隊も魔軍相手で手一杯だから、その隙をついて・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Since Zeas's army and guards are busy fighting the demon army, they took advantage of the gap..."},{"lineNumber":251196,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルが心配そう・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheel looks worried..."},{"lineNumber":251197,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちっ、蹴散らすぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Tch, let's scatter them"},{"lineNumber":251198,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":251199,"originalJapaneseLine":"よーし、なんとか盗賊団は倒したな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, somehow we've defeated the bandits."},{"lineNumber":251200,"originalJapaneseLine":"年配のじいさんが出てきて、ランスに礼を言う","translatedEnglishLine":"An elderly man comes out and thanks Rance"},{"lineNumber":251201,"originalJapaneseLine":"その人を見て、シィルが・・あっと・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Seeing that person, Sheel... ah..."},{"lineNumber":251202,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのじいさんもシィルに気がつく、まさか・・プライン家のシィルちゃんかね","translatedEnglishLine":"The old man also notices Sheel, could it be... Sheel of the Prine family?"},{"lineNumber":251203,"originalJapaneseLine":"生きていてよかった、ご両親もきっと喜ぶ、さぁ、会いにいってあげなさい。","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm glad you're alive, your parents will surely be happy, now go meet them."},{"lineNumber":251204,"originalJapaneseLine":"じゃ父と母は無事なのですか？","translatedEnglishLine":"So, are father and mother safe?"},{"lineNumber":251205,"originalJapaneseLine":"もちろんじゃ","translatedEnglishLine":"Of course."},{"lineNumber":251206,"originalJapaneseLine":"じいさんにお前の実家の場所は聞いた。さぁいくぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"I asked the old man the location of your family home. Let's go."},{"lineNumber":251207,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様・・ちょっととひっぱる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rance... she tugs at him a little."},{"lineNumber":251208,"originalJapaneseLine":"あのさっきの話、嘘ですよね・・","translatedEnglishLine":"That story from before, it was a lie, right..."},{"lineNumber":251209,"originalJapaneseLine":"その・・両親の前でひどい事をするって","translatedEnglishLine":"That... doing terrible things in front of my parents"},{"lineNumber":251210,"originalJapaneseLine":"にゃり、さーてどうかな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nyari, well, I wonder."},{"lineNumber":251211,"originalJapaneseLine":"その、私のお父さん、あのけっこう怒ると怖い人なんです。","translatedEnglishLine":"My father is actually quite scary when he gets angry."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルの過去話２
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheel's Past Story 2

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大都市オールドゼスに到着、町の様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the large city Old Zeas, the state of the town

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな飢えている、食料品は５〜１０倍の値段
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone is starving, food prices are 5 to 10 times higher

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飲食店は閉鎖、荒んでいる感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Restaurants are closed, giving a bleak feeling

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 腹を空かせた子供がランス達にめぐんでくれとやってくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hungry children come to Rance and the others asking for handouts

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士もいる、腹へった・・魔軍の奴ら根こそぎ食料を持っていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are soldiers too, hungry... the demon army guys take all the food away

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人が出てくるから勝てないけど、飢えて死ぬくらいなら戦った方がマシだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because demons appear and we can't win, but better to fight than starve to death

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次に奴らが要求してきたら戦う、渡す食料もないしな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next time they demand, we'll fight; we don't have food to give anyway

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひどい状況だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a terrible situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルはもっと非道い状況を予想していたので一安心、飢え死にしている人もいないしと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheel expected a worse situation, so she feels somewhat relieved that no one is starving to death

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、ところでお前の家はどこだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheel, by the way, where is your home?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここじゃないですよ、大都会オールドゼスではなくて、ここから少し離れた所に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not here, not in the big city Old Zeas, but somewhere a little far from here

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひまわり村という小さな村です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a small village called Himawari Village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なに、最初からそういえ、言いましたよー　さっきの昔話でも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What, say that from the start, I told you so — even in the old story earlier

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　ひまわり村に行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Go to Himawari Village

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　ガルティア退治を優先する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Prioritize defeating Galtia

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがシィルに聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance asks Sheel

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ところで、一度も実家に戻ろうとはしなかったのは何故だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, why did you never try to return to your family home?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様も鬼ではないぞ、裸で土下座してお願いしたらいつでもいかせてやったぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not a demon; if you had begged on your knees naked, I'd have let you go anytime

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両親が反対していたのに無理いって都会に出ようとした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though my parents opposed it, I insisted on going to the city

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人買いに言われた、私は死んだと報告されて、もう葬式もされたと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was told by slave traders that they reported me as dead, and already had a funeral

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様の元で絶対服従魔法がかかっていたせいもあるかもしれないが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It might also be because I was under absolute obedience magic by Lord Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何年も両親に連絡しなかったし、タイミングを逸した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I haven’t contacted my parents for years and missed the right timing

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに・・奴隷になっていますとか言えない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also... I couldn’t say I had become a slave

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みたいな事をぽつりと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She muttered something like that

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、オールドゼスの状況を見た限り、実家の田舎とかもっと大丈夫ですよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, judging from Old Zeas' condition, your rural hometown should be even safer

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全然気にする必要無いです、今は大事な任務の時です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no need to worry at all, now is an important mission time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戻りましょう。ねっねっ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's go back. Come on, come on

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、いく・・くくくく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I'll go... hehehe

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルがランスに話しかける・・もう両親の無事は確認されたようなものですし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheel speaks to Rance... it seems her parents' safety has already been confirmed

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私ほんとうに大丈夫ですよ、ここまで連れてきて頂けてありがとうございます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm really fine, thank you for bringing me this far.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・あの、ランス様、どうして私の両親に会おうと思ったのですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um, Lord Rance, why did you want to meet my parents?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか、その・・　なんかいい方に想像して顔を赤らめる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be, um... imagining something nice, blushing

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 娘さんを下さいとか・・えっ、えっ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Asking 'Give me your daughter' or something... eh, eh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴隷娘を手に入れたら、両親の前でする定番の鬼畜行為とは何か知っているか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you know the usual cruel acts done in front of the parents when you get a slave girl?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両親の前でお前を胸をもんだりしながら、お前の娘は俺の穴奴隷になったのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of your parents, I would fondle your breasts while saying your daughter became my hole-slave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうやって毎日遊んでやってるぜ、がははは・・とかだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I play with you like this every day, hahaha... or something like that

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エロマンガで読んだ事のあるシチュだ、ぜひ一度やりたいと思っていたのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a situation I've read about in erotic manga; I've wanted to try it once

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村の様子がおかしい、騒がしいぞ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The village's state is strange, it's noisy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら、山賊が現れて占領しているらしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, bandits appeared and are occupying it

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスの軍隊も警備隊も魔軍相手で手一杯だから、その隙をついて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since Zeas's army and guards are busy fighting the demon army, they took advantage of the gap...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルが心配そう・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheel looks worried...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっ、蹴散らすぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch, let's scatter them

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よーし、なんとか盗賊団は倒したな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, somehow we've defeated the bandits.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 年配のじいさんが出てきて、ランスに礼を言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An elderly man comes out and thanks Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その人を見て、シィルが・・あっと・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing that person, Sheel... ah...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのじいさんもシィルに気がつく、まさか・・プライン家のシィルちゃんかね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The old man also notices Sheel, could it be... Sheel of the Prine family?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生きていてよかった、ご両親もきっと喜ぶ、さぁ、会いにいってあげなさい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm glad you're alive, your parents will surely be happy, now go meet them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃ父と母は無事なのですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, are father and mother safe?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もちろんじゃ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じいさんにお前の実家の場所は聞いた。さぁいくぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I asked the old man the location of your family home. Let's go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様・・ちょっととひっぱる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance... she tugs at him a little.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのさっきの話、嘘ですよね・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That story from before, it was a lie, right...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その・・両親の前でひどい事をするって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That... doing terrible things in front of my parents

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: にゃり、さーてどうかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nyari, well, I wonder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その、私のお父さん、あのけっこう怒ると怖い人なんです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My father is actually quite scary when he gets angry.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルの過去話２
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheel's Past Story 2

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大都市オールドゼスに到着、町の様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the large city Old Zeas, the state of the town

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな飢えている、食料品は５〜１０倍の値段
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone is starving, food prices are 5 to 10 times higher

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飲食店は閉鎖、荒んでいる感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Restaurants are closed, giving a bleak feeling

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 腹を空かせた子供がランス達にめぐんでくれとやってくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hungry children come to Rance and the others asking for handouts

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士もいる、腹へった・・魔軍の奴ら根こそぎ食料を持っていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are soldiers too, hungry... the demon army guys take all the food away

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人が出てくるから勝てないけど、飢えて死ぬくらいなら戦った方がマシだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because demons appear and we can't win, but better to fight than starve to death

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次に奴らが要求してきたら戦う、渡す食料もないしな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next time they demand, we'll fight; we don't have food to give anyway

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひどい状況だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a terrible situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルはもっと非道い状況を予想していたので一安心、飢え死にしている人もいないしと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheel expected a worse situation, so she feels somewhat relieved that no one is starving to death

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、ところでお前の家はどこだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheel, by the way, where is your home?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここじゃないですよ、大都会オールドゼスではなくて、ここから少し離れた所に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not here, not in the big city Old Zeas, but somewhere a little far from here

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひまわり村という小さな村です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a small village called Himawari Village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なに、最初からそういえ、言いましたよー　さっきの昔話でも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What, say that from the start, I told you so — even in the old story earlier

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　ひまわり村に行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Go to Himawari Village

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　ガルティア退治を優先する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Prioritize defeating Galtia

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがシィルに聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance asks Sheel

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ところで、一度も実家に戻ろうとはしなかったのは何故だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, why did you never try to return to your family home?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様も鬼ではないぞ、裸で土下座してお願いしたらいつでもいかせてやったぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not a demon; if you had begged on your knees naked, I'd have let you go anytime

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両親が反対していたのに無理いって都会に出ようとした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though my parents opposed it, I insisted on going to the city

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人買いに言われた、私は死んだと報告されて、もう葬式もされたと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was told by slave traders that they reported me as dead, and already had a funeral

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様の元で絶対服従魔法がかかっていたせいもあるかもしれないが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It might also be because I was under absolute obedience magic by Lord Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何年も両親に連絡しなかったし、タイミングを逸した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I haven’t contacted my parents for years and missed the right timing

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに・・奴隷になっていますとか言えない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also... I couldn’t say I had become a slave

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みたいな事をぽつりと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She muttered something like that

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、オールドゼスの状況を見た限り、実家の田舎とかもっと大丈夫ですよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, judging from Old Zeas' condition, your rural hometown should be even safer

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全然気にする必要無いです、今は大事な任務の時です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no need to worry at all, now is an important mission time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戻りましょう。ねっねっ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's go back. Come on, come on

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、いく・・くくくく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I'll go... hehehe

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルがランスに話しかける・・もう両親の無事は確認されたようなものですし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheel speaks to Rance... it seems her parents' safety has already been confirmed

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私ほんとうに大丈夫ですよ、ここまで連れてきて頂けてありがとうございます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm really fine, thank you for bringing me this far.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・あの、ランス様、どうして私の両親に会おうと思ったのですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um, Lord Rance, why did you want to meet my parents?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか、その・・　なんかいい方に想像して顔を赤らめる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be, um... imagining something nice, blushing

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 娘さんを下さいとか・・えっ、えっ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Asking 'Give me your daughter' or something... eh, eh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴隷娘を手に入れたら、両親の前でする定番の鬼畜行為とは何か知っているか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you know the usual cruel acts done in front of the parents when you get a slave girl?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両親の前でお前を胸をもんだりしながら、お前の娘は俺の穴奴隷になったのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of your parents, I would fondle your breasts while saying your daughter became my hole-slave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうやって毎日遊んでやってるぜ、がははは・・とかだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I play with you like this every day, hahaha... or something like that

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エロマンガで読んだ事のあるシチュだ、ぜひ一度やりたいと思っていたのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a situation I've read about in erotic manga; I've wanted to try it once

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村の様子がおかしい、騒がしいぞ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The village's state is strange, it's noisy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら、山賊が現れて占領しているらしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, bandits appeared and are occupying it

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスの軍隊も警備隊も魔軍相手で手一杯だから、その隙をついて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since Zeas's army and guards are busy fighting the demon army, they took advantage of the gap...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルが心配そう・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheel looks worried...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっ、蹴散らすぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch, let's scatter them

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よーし、なんとか盗賊団は倒したな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, somehow we've defeated the bandits.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 年配のじいさんが出てきて、ランスに礼を言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An elderly man comes out and thanks Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その人を見て、シィルが・・あっと・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing that person, Sheel... ah...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのじいさんもシィルに気がつく、まさか・・プライン家のシィルちゃんかね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The old man also notices Sheel, could it be... Sheel of the Prine family?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生きていてよかった、ご両親もきっと喜ぶ、さぁ、会いにいってあげなさい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm glad you're alive, your parents will surely be happy, now go meet them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃ父と母は無事なのですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, are father and mother safe?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もちろんじゃ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じいさんにお前の実家の場所は聞いた。さぁいくぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I asked the old man the location of your family home. Let's go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様・・ちょっととひっぱる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance... she tugs at him a little.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのさっきの話、嘘ですよね・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That story from before, it was a lie, right...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その・・両親の前でひどい事をするって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That... doing terrible things in front of my parents

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: にゃり、さーてどうかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nyari, well, I wonder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その、私のお父さん、あのけっこう怒ると怖い人なんです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My father is actually quite scary when he gets angry.
